name: Art games: Color by number
description:
Fill some colors in your life with Art games: Color by number!
If you are an art lover and want to breathe some fresh, creative energy into your smartphone, this user-friendly and enjoyable app can indulge you with coloring.

Coloring books are no longer just for the kids. Adult coloring books are all the rage right now. Art games: Color by number is an enticing digital coloring app tailored to your inner artist and others looking for new ways to embrace creativity. This app allows you to easily color masterpieces on your devices by existing numbers with a smooth experience.

This app comes with tons of different artworks from our talented artists and unique features. You will have a chance to explore all the creative paintings grouped into categories such as nature, flower, food, human, animals, and especially the story that tells you lots of tales. This app updates new artworks every day, which means you can color your imagination as much as you can.

Apart from this, many exclusive boosters in the game can surprise you for sure. Art games: Color by number supports Hints that show you the numbers you miss and Bomb and Paint Bucket to complete the artworks quicker.

HIGHLIGHT FEATURES
- Tons of different artworks divided into categories to pass time
- Powerful boosters: Hint, Bomb, and Paint bucket to paint quicker
- New paintings are updated every day
- No time limit to enjoy and let your inner artist out.
- Free & Simple to play with endless fun.

Painting a picture can freshen up your mood and make you more optimistic and lively. Now you don’t need to carry your canvas, papers, and color palette to different places. With Art games: Color by number, you can color your pictures wherever you want with ease and comfort in this staycation!
